General.Name: BizLink Holding Inc
General.Description: Bizlink Holding Inc. researches, designs, develops, manufactures, and sells products and components for various technology industries in the United States, China, Germany, Malaysia, Taiwan, Italy, and internationally. It operates through Computing and Transportation, Industrial Application, Home Appliance, and Others segments. The company provides internal cables and wiring harness, power whips and DC power cables, loopback modules, and connectors; data centers; direct attach and active optical cables, optical transceivers, and optical path panels; adapters and cable assemblies; and cable storage, integration of electrical and mechanical parts, over molding of fixings and mountings for cable harnesses, textile braided cables for harness systems, complex wire harnesses, and systems and customized solutions, as well as power cords, wire harnesses, and wires and cables. It also offers electric vehicles (EV) battery management, EV TVSH, high voltage, main, engine, and tail-light harnesses; charging systems; car charger product series and junction boxes; automotive wires; towline, micro coaxial, photoelectric hybrid, drag chain, phase, defibrillation, and USB extender cables; optical fiber patch cords, thermistor detectors, medical raw wires, and medical equipment box build and system integrators; and transceivers, ultra-compact WDM products, couplers/PLCs, VOAs, circulators/isolators/hybrid products, high-density modules, ultra-low loss WDM, and standard WDM for optical fiber communications. In addition, the company provides semiconductor equipment, multi-conductor, coaxial, umbilical assembly, high-voltage, and test equipment power cables; single and multi-drive cabinets; fixed battery storage equipment; AC power wall and data storage power supply products; RC power modules; vehicle automation train control system testing cables; electrical control boxes; industrial box build and system integrators; and solar energy connectivity solutions. Bizlink Holding Inc. was founded in 1996 and is based in New Taipei City, Tai
